description.english: Earn all achievements.
description.french: Remporter tous les succès.
description.german: Verdiene alle Errungenschaften.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli achievement.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.

description.english: WWE Universe - Defeat Undertaker at WrestleMania using a custom Superstar.
description.french: Univers WWE - Battez Undertaker à WrestleMania en utilisant une Superstar Créée.
description.german: WWE-Welt - Besiege Undertaker bei Wrestlemania mit einem erstellten Superstar.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Sconfiggi Undertaker a WrestleMania usando una Superstar personalizzata.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Derrota a Undertaker en Wrestlemania con una Superstar creada.

description.english: WWE Universe - Play and win 180 rivalry matches.
description.french: Univers WWE - Jouez à et remportez 180 matchs de rivalités.
description.german: WWE-Welt - Spiele und gewinne 180 Rivalitätsmatches.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Gioca e vinci 180 match tra rivali.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y gana 180 combates de rivalidad.

description.english: WWE Universe - Play and win 50 matches.
description.french: Univers WWE - Jouez à et remportez 50 matchs.
description.german: WWE-Welt - Spiele und gewinne 50 Matches.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Gioca e vinci 50 match.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y gana 50 combates.

description.english: WWE Universe - Win WrestleMania main event as the Royal Rumble winner. (Single play)
description.french: Univers WWE - Gagnez le main event de WrestleMania comme vainqueur du Royal Rumble (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne den Hauptkampf der WrestleMania als Sieger des Royal Rumbles. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci il Main Event di WrestleMania come vincitore della Royal Rumble (Singolo).
description.spanish: Universo WWE- Gana el evento principal de WrestleMania como ganador de Royal Rumble (un jugador).

description.english: WWE Universe - Play and win WWE World Heavyweight Championship 3 times. (Single play)
description.french: Univers WWE - Remportez le WWE World Heavyweight Championship 3 fois (mode solo).
description.german: WWE-Welt - Spiele und gewinne 3-mal die WWE World Heavyweight Championship. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: WWE Universe - Gioca e vinci il WWE World Heavyweight Championship 3 volte (Singolo).
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y gana el WWE World Heavyweight Championship 3 veces (un jugador).

description.english: Win a match without reaching Stamina Level 3. (Single play)
description.french: Remportez un match sans atteindre le niveau 3 d'endurance (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne ein Match, ohne Ausdauerlevel 3 zu erreichen. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci un match senza arrivare al livello 3 dell'energia (Singolo).
description.spanish: Gana un combate sin llegar al nivel 3 de aguante (un jugador).

description.english: Win a match using a Desperation Pin. (Single play)
description.french: Remportez un match en effectuant un tombé désespéré (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne ein Match mit einem Desperation Pin. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci un match usando uno schienamento Disperazione (Singolo).
description.spanish: Gana un combate con un Desperation Pin (un jugador).

description.english: Strike or wrench an opponent in 5 different chain hold positions in 1 match. (Single play)
description.french: Frappez ou serrez un adv. dans 5 positions différentes lors d'enchaînements dans un match (solo).
description.german: Schlage o. halte einen Gegner in 5 verschiedenen Ketten-Haltepositionen in 1 Match. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Colpisci o stringi un avversario in 5 diverse prese di sottomissione in un solo match (Singolo).
description.spanish: Golpea o retuerce a un rival en 5 posiciones de cadena en un combate (un jugador)

description.english: Perform a giant swing with an OMG! Moment. (Single play/Exhibition)
description.french: Exécutez un Giant Swing avec un moment OMG ! (mode solo/ Exhibition).
description.german: Führe einen Giant Swing mit einem OMG!-Moment aus. (Einzelspieler/Exhibition)
description.italian: Esegui uno swing micidiale con un momento OMG! (Singolo/Esibizione).
description.spanish: Realiza un Giant Swing con un momento OMG! (un jugador/Exhibición).

description.english: Win a match by a leverage pin. (Single play)
description.french: Gagnez un match avec un Tombé spécial (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne ein Match mit einem Leverage Pin. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci un match con uno schienamento opposto (Singolo).
description.spanish: Gana un combate con una inversión con pin (un jugador).

description.english: Successfully perform a hot tag during a tag match. (Single play)
description.french: Exécutez un Hot Tag avec succès lors d'un match Tag Team (mode solo).
description.german: Mach in einem Tag Match einen erfolgreichen Hot Tag. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Esegui un hot tag durante un match Tag Team (Singolo).
description.spanish: Realiza un Hot Tag durante un combate Tag Team (Un jugador).

description.english: Hit an opponent with a foreign object or put them through a table. (Single play)
description.french: Frappez un adversaire avec un objet ou faites-le passer à travers une table (mode solo).
description.german: Triff einen Gegner mit einem Objekt oder lass ihn durch einen Tisch krachen. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Colpisci un avversario con un oggetto o scaglialo contro un tavolo (Singolo).
description.spanish: Golpea a un rival con un objeto o haz que atraviese una mesa (un jugador).

description.english: Perform The Shield's triple powerbomb. (Single play/Exhibition)
description.french: Exécutez le Triple Powerbomb de The Shield (mode solo / Exhibition).
description.german: Führe die Triple Powerbomb von The Shield aus. (Einzelspieler/Exhibition)
description.italian: Esegui la Triple Powerbomb di The Shield (Singolo/Esibizione).
description.spanish: Realiza el Powerbomb triple de The Shield. (Un jugador/Exhibición).

description.english: Put your opponent through the announce table via any means. (Single play/Exhibition)
description.french: Jetez l'adv. au travers de la table des commentateurs de n'importe quelle manière (solo/Exhi.).
description.german: Befördere deinen Gegner mit allen Mitteln durch den Ansagertisch. (Einzelspieler/Exhibition)
description.italian: Sfonda il tavolo cronisti scaraventandoci sopra il tuo avversario (Singolo/Esibizione).
description.spanish: Haz que tu rival atraviese la mesa de comentaristas como sea (Un jugador/Exhibición).

description.english: Eliminate 12 opponents with the same Superstar in a single Royal Rumble match. (Single play)
description.french: Éliminez 12 adversaires avec la même Superstar dans un seul match Royal Rumble (mode solo).
description.german: Eliminiere 12 Gegner mit dem gleichen Superstar in einem Royal Rumble Match. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Elimina 12 avversari con la stessa Superstar in un solo match Royal Rumble (Singolo).
description.spanish: Elimina a 12 rivales en un mismo Royal Rumble con la misma Superstar (un jugador).

description.english: Win in 20 match variations. (Single play)
description.french: Remportez 20 variations de match (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne in 20 verschiedenen Match-Varianten. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci 20 match diversi (Singolo).
description.spanish: Gana en 20 variaciones de combate (un jugador).

description.english: Win with 50 different Superstars. (Single play)
description.french: Gagnez avec 50 Superstars différentes (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne mit 50 verschiedenen Superstars. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci con 50 Superstar diverse (Singolo).
description.spanish: Gana con 50 Superstars diferentes (un jugador).

description.english: Defeat John Cena using one of the NXT Superstars.
description.french: Battez John Cena en utilisant une Superstar du NXT.
description.german: Besiege John Cena mit einem der NXT-Superstars.
description.italian: Sconfiggi John Cena usando una delle Superstar NXT.
description.spanish: Derrota a John Cena con una de las Superstars de NXT.

description.english: Beat Big Show using Rey Mysterio on Hard difficulty. (Single play)
description.french: Battez Big Show en utilisant Rey Mysterio en Difficile (mode solo).
description.german: Besiege Big Show mit Rey Mysterio auf Schwer. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Sconfiggi Big Show usando Rey Mysterio a difficoltà Difficile (Singolo).
description.spanish: Vence a Big Show con Rey Mysterio en dificultad Difícil (un jugador).

description.english: Win 10 times using a custom Superstar.
description.french: Gagnez 10 fois avec une Superstar Créée.
description.german: Gewinne 10-mal mit einem erstellten Superstar.
description.italian: Ottieni 10 vittorie con una Superstar personalizzata.
description.spanish: Gana 10 veces con una Superstar creada.

description.english: Make an opponent tap out with a submission that is not a Finisher or Signature move. (Single Play)
description.french: Soumettez un adversaire avec une soumission qui n'est ni un Finisher ni un Coup Spécial. (Solo)
description.german: Bringe 1 Geg. mit 1 Submission, die k. Finisher o. Signature Move ist, zur Aufgabe. (Einzelsp.)
description.italian: Sottometti un avversario con una mossa che non sia una finale o speciale (Singolo).
description.spanish: Haz que se rinda un rival con una sumisión que no sea un remate ni un mov. personal (un jugador).

displayName.spanish: ¡Eso sí que ha sido un combate!

description.english: Earn 1000 points or more playing in a single ranked match.
description.french: Gagnez 1 000 points ou plus en jouant un match de type matchmaking selon classement.
description.german: Verdiene mindestens 1.000 Punkte bei einem Ranglisten-Spiel.
description.italian: Ottieni almeno 1.000 punti in una partita classificata.
description.spanish: Gana 1000 puntos o más en una partida igualada.

description.english: Win 50 ranked matches.
description.french: Gagnez 50 matchmakings selon classement.
description.german: Gewinne 50 Ranglisten-Spiele.
description.italian: Vinci 50 partite classificate.
description.spanish: Gana 50 partidas igualadas.

description.english: Reach mid-carder rank playing ranked matches.
description.french: Atteignez le rang 1re classe dans les matchmakings selon classement.
description.german: Erreiche in Ranglisten-Spielen den Nebendarsteller-Rang.
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Mid-carder nelle partite classificate.
description.spanish: Llega al rango Del montón en partidas igualadas.

description.english: Upload some kind of user created content once.
description.french: Transférez en ligne un de vos contenus créés.
description.german: Lade einen selbst erstellten Inhalt hoch.
description.italian: Effettua almeno un upload di contenuti creati dall'utente.
description.spanish: Envía algún tipo de contenido creado por el usuario una vez.

description.english: 2K Showcase - Complete "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect".
description.french: 2K Showcase - Finir "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect".
description.german: 2K Showcase - Schließe "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect" ab.
description.italian: 2K Showcase - Completa "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect".
description.spanish: 2K Showcase - Completa "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect".

description.french: 2K Showcase - Finir "Meilleurs amis, pires ennemis".

description.spanish: 2K Showcase - Completa "Grandes amigos, enemigos a muerte".

description.french: 2K Showcase - Finir 50 % des objectifs.

description.spanish: 2K Showcase - Completa el 50% de los objetivos.

description.french: 2K Showcase - Finir "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect" en Légendaire.

description.spanish: 2K Showcase - Gana "Hustle, Loyalty, Disrespect" en dificultad Leyenda.

description.english: MyCAREER - Win the WWE Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Gagnez le WWE Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die WWE Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Diventa Campione WWE.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el WWE Championship.

description.english: MyCAREER - Earn an overall total of 1,000,000 VC.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Gagnez un total de 1 000 000 VC.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Verdiene insgesamt 1.000.000 VC.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Ottieni un totale di 1.000.000 VC.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana un total global de 1 000 000 VC.

displayName.italian: Da qui parte la mia via

description.english: MyCAREER - Complete the tutorial.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Terminez l'initiation.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Schließe das Tutorial ab.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: MI CARRERA - Completa el tutorial.

description.english: MyCAREER - Reach SmackDown.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Atteignez SmackDown.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Erreiche SmackDown.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Raggiungi SmackDown.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Llega a SmackDown.

description.english: MyCAREER - Have 5 attributes reach a value of 80 or higher.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Obtenez une valeur d'au moins 80 pour 5 attributs.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Erreiche bei 5 Eigenschaften einen Wert von mindestens 80.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Porta 5 attributi almeno a 80.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Consigue que 5 atributos alcancen un valor de 80 o más.

description.english: MyCAREER - Complete the NXT part.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Finir la partie NXT.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Schließe den NXT-Teil ab.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Completa la parte in NXT.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Completa la parte de NXT.

description.english: MyCAREER - Participate in WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam, and Survivor Series.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Participez à WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam et Survivor Series.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Nimm an WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam und der Survivor Series teil.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Partecipa a WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam e Survivor Series.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Participa en WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam y Survivor Series.
